entry.title: Non-confiscatory Transaction Weight Limit
entry.summary: The discussion centers on the BitVM technology and its resilience in handling transactions, particularly emphasizing the minimal impact that certain types of transactions might have on block construction. The belief held is that even if there arises a necessity for these specific transactions, their occurrence will be rare enough not to significantly affect the process of building blocks within the system. This perspective suggests confidence in the efficiency and robustness of BitVM's design when it comes to managing transaction frequencies without compromising performance.
